title: 陳淨心誤認Matt Damon係美國CIA特務單野俾印度佬瘋狂恥笑中

replies.msg:
Pro-Beijing leader posts photo of CIA agent, creates chaos. Twist: It is Matt Damon from Jason Bourne

https://www.indiatoday.in/trending-news/story/pro-beijing-leader-posts-photo-of-cia-agent-creates-chaos-twist-it-is-matt-damon-from-jason-bourne-1574485-2019-07-28

Pro-Beijing leader posts photo of CIA agent, creates chaos. Twist: It is Matt Damon from Jason Bourne

A Pro-Beijing leader posted a photo of a “CIA agent” and said that he is “stirring up chaos” in Hong Kong. Do note that the picture actually features Matt Damon from Jason Bourne.



Image posted on Twitter by Ray Kwong.
The internet is busy laughing over a tweet that has surfaced online and features Hollywood actor Matt Damon. No, sorry, a "CIA agent. " We'll explain the whole deal. But if you are wondering why the internet is amused, it's because of a viral post in which the actor was mistaken for a "CIA agent" on account of his role in his film Jason Bourne.
As per a tweet shared by Ray Kwong, a Pro-Beijing leader posted a photo of a "CIA agent" and said that he is "stirring up chaos" in Hong Kong. No prizes for guessing that the CIA agent in question is actually a picture of Matt Damon from Jason Bourne.

Matt Damon was cast as Jason Bourne, a former CIA assassin, in Paul Greengrass' 2016 film. It appears that the Pro-Beijing leader considered Matt Damon to be a CIA agent for real. Netizens cannot stop laughing over this and posted hilarious comments. The tweet, in fact, has garnered several likes and has been shared online frequently.
"Hollywood definitely has a much bigger influence in China than whatever China's influence in America, " read one comment while another said: "Yeah looks like they are getting used to believing whatever they see."

We wonder what Matt Damon thinks about this!
廢老成日中伏
D鬼佬個個都差唔多樣嫁啦
平民可以柒出國際你都算係第1個
宣傳嚟啫，影音舖已從新上架去當眼處
花了很多人力物力才得到這寶貴資料

我哋由612開始爭取成立獨立調查委員會
不過，我哋從來冇討論過委員會由咩人去組成
好多人分析琴日中共為成立獨立調查委員會開綠燈
我哋係時候開始討論當中嘅細節


試過有法官判示威者以胸部襲警後，相信大家都明白香港有好多紅底法官
所以獨立調查委員會一定唔可以只係有本地法官組成

我地要嘅獨立調查委員會係
由國際專家、聯合國，甚至海牙軍事法庭嘅人組成


拒絕港共自己人查自己人

要由國際專家調查事件

［廣傳］ 有咩人組成獨立調查委員會？！
